backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend for a gaming wallet app, including user registration, profile management, game history, deposit requests, and access control with referral code support.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary describing the LoginSignup component's 4-step authentication flow including a simulated OTP verification step.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Gaming Wallet App that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing app-level state including authentication, user profile fetching, page navigation, and conditional rendering between login and the main app layout.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Auto-rotating promotional banner component cycling through three slides (welcome bonus, deposit offer, withdrawal info) with fade/slide animation every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Activity, Refer, Support, Account) that highlights the active page with a gold indicator.
frontend/src/components/GameGrid.tsx: Displays two sections of game cards (Multiplayer and Skill & Strategy) in a 3-column grid, each card showing an image, badge, and a Play Now button that navigates to the game page.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing the user's avatar, VIP level, wallet balance with a shimmer animation, and an Add Cash button that navigates to the payment page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that renders children with a scrollable main area and conditionally shows the BottomNav (hidden on payment and game pages).
frontend/src/components/LoginSignup.tsx: Multi-step login/signup component that handles Internet Identity auth, mobile OTP verification, and new user registration with referral code support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, reinitializing it when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state across the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/utilities, custom CSS variables for a dark navy/gold theme, and animations like shimmer, pulse-glow, and rocket-up.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Account.tsx: Account page displaying user profile, wallet balance, win/loss stats, and game history, with a logout action that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/pages/Activity.tsx: Daily check-in page that tracks login streaks and lets users claim escalating daily bonus rewards stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlay.tsx: Renders individual mini-games (Dragon vs Tiger, 7 Up Down, and others) with bet selection, animations, and win/loss result handling via a shared onResult callback.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page layout that composes the Header, Banner, and GameGrid components along with a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/pages/Payment.tsx: Deposit/add-cash page where users select an amount, enter a 12-digit UTR number, and submit a deposit request to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/ReferEarn.tsx: Refer-and-earn page displaying the user's referral code with copy/share functionality and a step-by-step explanation of the referral reward flow.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Customer support page with quick-topic chips and a subject/message form that simulates submission and shows a confirmation state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the gaming wallet app, defining dark mode, custom fonts (Rajdhani, Orbitron), and an extended color palette including gold, navy, and CSS variable-based semantic colors using oklch.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 9) describing the gaming wallet app's features, architecture, known issues, and existing implemented features including signup/login, header, banner, game grid, payments, and bottom navigation.
